RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

RevenueFromGrants.label: Revenue from Grants (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RevenueFromGrants.description: Revenue earned during the period from non-repayable sum of money awarded to an entity to carry out a specific purpose as provided in grant agreements.

RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer
RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Collateral, Right to Reclaim Securities
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.label: Security Owned and Pledged as Collateral, Fair Value
SecurityOwnedAndPledgedAsCollateralFairV.description: Fair value of financial instrument held by the entity for its own account (proprietary securities) for trading or investment purposes that are carried at fair value and pledged to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions.

ServicingFeesNet.label: Bank Servicing Fees (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ServicingFeesNet.description: Amount of revenue from servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others. Includes premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest exercisable or convertible options. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TangibleCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Actual
TangibleCapital.description: Amount of tangible capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital, Minimum
TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.description: Amount of minimum tangible capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TangibleCapitalRequiredForCapitalAdequac.description: Ratio of minimum tangible capital to tangible assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TangibleCapitalToTangibleAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tangible Capital Ratio, Actual
TangibleCapitalToTangibleAssets.description: Ratio of tangible capital to tangible assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.label: Tax Adjustments, Settlements, and Unusual Provisions
TaxAdjustmentsSettlementsAndUnusualProvi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

TransferOfOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer from Real Estate Owned
TransferOfOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred out of real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Amount of deferred fees paid by borrowers and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

UndistributedEarningsAllocatedToParticip.label: Undistributed Earnings Allocated to Participating Securities (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UndistributedEarningsAllocatedToParticip.description: Earnings allocated (not distributed) to participating securities under the two-class method to the extent that participating securities may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Allocated to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAllocatedToPart.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to participating securities for the basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under the two-class method.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

DividendsPreferredStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
DividendsPreferredStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

FinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired1.label: Finite-lived Intangible Assets Acquired
FinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired1.description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets, lacking physical substance with a definite life, from an acquisition.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.description: "The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.
